scenario_text.value:
Hold up, what? You saying there was an
accident?

Dang, man, I ain’t never seen something like
this before.

Whaddaya think, should we just bust on in
there? Grab a video for some views?

Ha ha, whoa, hold up, man. They’ll get pissed
at us for sure.

What’s his face—Shuuji?—said he’d go and ask
the teachers about it, y’know.

Man, how long are they gonna make us wait
here, anyway? I got things to do, people!
*sigh* Man, enough with this. I’m out.

Word? Then I’ll head back, too. Who cares
about some old stones or whatever?
